title: Featured Project
description: A Handy 7-seg display which displays time and has a stop watch function.
1. This web application is developed with HTML/CSS/Javascript for frontend and has fully functional backend features implemented with PHP and SQL.
2. Has fully functional user login system implemented with PHP and SQL database.
3. User can customize background image and welcome message when logged in.
4. Has a stopwatch feature with split time function.
5. Has world time feature with a list of 4 locations. Implemented with a web API. Background would change based on selected location and time of the day.
6. Download the files from my Github page and deploy it on a server to run the application.
7. Please refer to the Github page of the project for more detailed information.

title: Web Game
description: This is a mini web game powered by ZIMjs - https://zimjs.com/.
1. The game is based on the Chinese legend of Kuafu -- an ancient diety who ran after the Sun.
2. Left click to jump (click again for double jump while airborned) and avoid obstacles.
3. Pick up foods and drink from river to recover health so that Kuafu could run further.
4. Drinking from a river replenishes large amount of health. Reach the mileage of 99999999 to win.
5. Spacebar to pause and unpause game.

title: Javascript Class
description: AjaxClient is a general purpose client side Javascript API class which makes xhr requests to backend or url and then relays response to front end. It is capable of both GET and POST operations.
Please refer to the Github page of the project for more detailed information.
